summary: I WAS DRIVING DOWN THE HIGHWAY AND THE VEHICLE ABRUPTLY LOST POWER, A TRIANGLE WITH AN EXCLAMATION POINT CAME ON IN THE DASHBOARD AND THE DATA SYSTEM SAID "STOP SAFELY NOW".  THIS HAPPENED MULTIPLE TIMES DURING THE SAME DRIVE.  THE DEALERSHIP REPLACED THE MEC PUMP.  ABOUT ONE YEAR LATER THE SAME ISSUE BEGAN OCCURRING MULTIPLES TIMES PER DAY UNTIL I WAS ABLE TO GET IT TO A DEALERSHIP.  THEY REPLACED THE THROTTLE BODY, THE ISSUE OCCURRED AGAIN.  THEY REPLACED THE TRANSMISSION, THE ISSUE OCCURRED AGAIN. IT IS NOW AT THE FORD DEALERSHIP GETTING DIAGNOSED YET AGAIN.  THIS IS A VERY SERIOUS SAFETY ISSUE AND MUST BE RESOLVED.  *TR
